skills.skill: Detail-oriented, organized and able to manage multiple priorities

duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensures operations meet company standards in all restaurant zones during a shift.
Acts as manager on duty and opens and closes the restaurant.
Manages cash handling and ensures accountability.
Utilizes reward and recognition program for the crewmembers in the restaurant.
Ensures cleanliness of the restaurant and ensures the facility is in good working order.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of restaurant or retail management experience
High school diploma or equivalent required, some college preferred
